reviews.review: Игра убивает время на карантине но читеров без прайма больше чем волос на голове

Very good game. Will never get tired of the anxiety and thrill this game has to offer.
очень хорошая игра мне очень не нравиться она
updates are fucking ridiculous . Every fucking 2 days or something
Bildiğiniz cs iyisiyle kötüsüyle. Yıllar sonra oynayayım dedim ama içerisi şampiyonlar ligi gibi. Yeni Malatyasporun la liga da mücadele etmesi durumu yaşanıyor.

You'll either play this game with friends just to have fun or you'll sink your entire life into it. You'll buy a new setup just for this game, wasting thousands of dollars, just to have a small advantage. You'll miss school and lie to your parents that you're sick just to get in some aim practice.

Anyway, nice gaem 9/10

Oyunu bedava yaptılar. Artık daha fazla hile gelmeye başladı. Ama yine de gayet güzel bir oyun.

Беспонтовая игра, особенно после того, как бесплатной стала. Не тратьте время. Уверяю, в игре нет контента, даже на 10 гигов, а весит она 15. Догадываетесь почему?
this is a great game to play with some mates and has some wonderful guns, skins and maps so you dont get bored of it

Molto competitivo, però pieno di russi!

I been playing CSGO for years and I believe it is a great game to be played. The beginning of playing was really amazing for me because it was my first fps game and that is when I fell in love with CSGO. Times may get hard and stressful in games but the feeling for when you pop off and have the spotlight on you for just a moment, that's when you'll fall in love too.
Needs to be ported over to a newer engine and have 128 tick servers instead of 64, vac also needs to be completely overhauled

Very fun game. I recommend it to everyone that likes getting pissed off after every game. I would also recommend it to people that know how to speak russian, because I cannot get a single competitive lobby that doesn't include russians. Valve, please start banning russians that swear too much and team kill you. Thank you and see you guys in-game!
